p: The Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI), an alliance founded in Davos in 2017 by the Indian and Norwegian governments, the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, the Wellcome Trust and the World Economic Forum, has the mission of accelerating the development of vaccines against emerging infectious diseases and making fair access to them possible during outbreaks. It is working with medical authorities around the world and vaccines manufacturers to support the development of COVID-19 vaccines.
